Yes, do you have a question you'd like to ask me?
Yes, sir. I have a few questions about the class requirements.
Sure, what would you like to know?
Well, could you tell me how to use this?
Okay, let me show you. First of all, you should insert your student ID.
Now, it will print out the class requirements.
There will also be a few quizzes and homework assignments during the semester.
And what will they be worth?
They will count for 10% of your final grade. Attendance is also worth 10%.
